uk.co.caprica.vlcj.discovery

Class AbstractNativeDiscoveryStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.caprica.vlcj.discovery.AbstractNativeDiscoveryStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NativeDiscoveryStrategy
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StandardNativeDiscoveryStrategy

    public abstract class AbstractNativeDiscoveryStrategy
extends Object
implements NativeDiscoveryStrategy
    Base implementation for a component that attempts to locate the libvlc native resources.

    This implementation looks for libvlc shared libraries by name in pre-defined directory locations.

    Extra directory names can be provided by implementations of the getDirectoryNames(List) template method in sub-classes.

    If the named native libraries are found in a particular directory, then that directory is registered as a native library search path for JNA.
